member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.MouseFollower.FollowerMode
member.summary: 获得/设置 MouseFollowerMode 模式

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.MouseFollower.GlobalMode
member.summary: 获得/设置 GlobalMode 全局模式

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.MouseFollower.Content
member.summary: 获得/设置 Content 文本，图标，图片路径，视频路径

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.MouseFollower.ChildContent
member.summary: 获得/设置 RenderFragment 实例

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.MouseFollowerOptions.IconSvgNamePrefix
member.summary: SVG sprite class name prefix of icon.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.MouseFollowerOptions.IconSvgSrc
member.summary: SVG sprite source. If you are not using SVG sprites leave this blank.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.MouseFollowerOptions.DataAttr
member.summary: Name of data attribute for changing cursor state directly in HTML markdown. Uses an event delegation.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.MouseFollowerOptions.ActiveState
member.summary: Active (mousedown) class name state. Set false to disable.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.MouseFollowerOptions.VisibleOnState
member.summary: Automatically show/hide cursor when state added. Can be useful when implementing a hidden cursor follower.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.MouseFollowerOptions.Ease
member.summary: Timing function of cursor movement. See gsap easing.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.MouseFollowerOptions.Overwrite
member.summary: Overwrite or remain cursor position when mousemove event happened. See gsap overwrite modes.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.MouseFollowerOptions.SkewingText
member.summary: Skew effect factor in a text state. Set 0 to disable skew in this mode.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.MouseFollowerOptions.SkewingIcon
member.summary: Skew effect factor in a icon state. Set 0 to disable skew in this mode.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.MouseFollowerOptions.SkewingMedia
member.summary: Skew effect factor in a media (image/video) state. Set 0 to disable skew in this mode.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.MouseFollowerOptions.SkewingDelta
member.summary: Skew effect base delta. Set 0 to disable skew in this mode.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.MouseFollowerOptions.SkewingDeltaMax
member.summary: Skew effect max delta. Set 0 to disable skew in this mode.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.MouseFollowerOptions.ShowTimeout
member.summary: Delay before show. May be useful for the spawn animation to work properly.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.MouseFollowerOptions.HideOnLeave
member.summary: Hide the cursor when mouse leave container.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.MouseFollowerOptions.HideTimeout
member.summary: Hiding delay. Should be equal to the CSS hide animation time.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.MouseFollowerOptions.HideMediaTimeout
member.summary: Hiding delay. Should be equal to the CSS hide animation time.
